name: Send Go4Clients personalized Call to new Google Sheet Spreadsheet rows
description:
When a new row is added to Google Sheets Spreadsheet, Go4Clients will send a personalized Call to the recipient. You could use your own audio or use Text2Speech. 
The template uses [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y0wCp8jhPwAxxwEsD8KF6Tzxy6s7-mQdIQ5VoXrQl40/edit?usp=sharing) example spreadsheet.
